title: Edward G. Robinson | Actors and Sin 1952 | Drama | Colorized Full Movie

sources.title: Edward G. Robinson | Actors and Sin 1952 | Drama | Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
A theater producer recalls various stories of thespian triumphs and tribulations, revealing the humorous and dramatic sides of the entertainment world. Through a series of vignettes, the film explores the joys and challenges of a life in showbiz, providing a charming glimpse into the world of actors.

Original title: Actors and Sin (1952) AKA: Ben Hecht's Actor's Blood and Woman of Sin

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/0bY1ZHsTYD0

Directors: Ben Hecht, Lee Garmes
Writer: Ben Hecht
Stars: Edward G. Robinson, Eddie Albert, Marsha Hunt
Genres: Colorized classics, Comedy, Drama
